CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Classification_CA_Manuel__c), 'S', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_S__c, 'S', 30, 30) & ' ', 'M', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_M__c, 'M', 30, 30) & ' ', 'K', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_K__c, 'K', 30, 30) & ' ', 'K1', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_K1__c, 'K1', 30, 30) & ' ', 'K2', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_K2__c, 'K2', 30, 30) & ' ', 'K3', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_K3__c, 'K3', 30, 30) & ' ', CASE( TEXT(Classification__c), 'S', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_S__c, 'S', 30, 30) & ' ', 'M', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_M__c, 'M', 30, 30) & ' ', 'K', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_K__c, 'K', 30, 30) & ' ', 'K1', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_K1__c, 'K1', 30, 30) & ' ', 'K2', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_K2__c, 'K2', 30, 30) & ' ', 'K3', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_K3__c, 'K3', 30, 30) & ' ', '' ) ) & CASE( TEXT(Empreinte_Geographique__c), 'I', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_I__c, 'I', 30, 30), 'N', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_N__c, 'N', 30, 30), 'R', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_R__c, 'R', 30, 30), '', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_R__c, 'R', 30, 30), '' ) & CASE( TEXT(Classification_OffreProduit__c), 'M', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_M_Produit__c, 'M', 30, 30) & ' ', 'P', IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_P__c, 'P', 30, 30) & ' ', '' ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Groupement__c)), IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesClassification__c.Classification_G__c, 'G', 30, 30), '' )
CustomField.label: Classification Client
